Package pymobu :: Package components :: Module constraints

[frames] | no frames]

Module constraints

source code

Constraint Module

Individual constraint classes and related functions

You can instantiate a PyMoBu constraint passing a MotionBuilder constraint into one of the specific constraint classes.

You can also create a specific constraint through either the class's 'Create' method or through the CreateConstraint function.

Function Details [hide private]

CreateConstraint(type, name=None)

source code 

Create a constraint with the given type and optionally with a name

Parameters:
  • type - name of constraint type found in kConstraintTypes
  • name - name to give constraint. Default is used if None
